text: "Beer Man" is the debut song co-written and recorded by American country music artist Trent Willmon. It was released in April 2004 as the first single from the album Trent Willmon. The song reached #30 on the Billboard Hot Country Singles & Tracks chart. The song was written by Willmon and Casey Beathard. ==Chart performance== {|class="wikitable sortable" !align="left"|Chart (2004) !align="center"|Peak position |- |} ==References== Category:2004 debut singles Category:2004 songs Category:Trent Willmon songs Category:Songs written by Casey Beathard Category:Songs written by Trent Willmon Category:Song recordings produced by Frank Rogers (record producer) Category:Columbia Records singles
title: Beer Man (song)
